metadata.name: Κόκκινη Μέδουσα
metadata.description:
This creature is often found among networks of high computing power. Most often it looks like a woman from 3 to 5 meters tall, her body covered by strong silver skin with glints of plasma energy. Her long red hair is very flexible, and she use it to move quickly and to connect to power systems. 
She eats a large amount of energy for sustenance. Also, she is evolving and exploring the weaknesses of power grids by connecting to communications networks and supercomputers.
Many times she became the cause of large technological disasters.
